name: The Fledgeling
description:
You are a baby magpie who awakens in an abandoned rural town that seems to have a mind of its own. Is it something about the town that's off, or is it you?

A short (15-20 min) Twine game about the memories we keep.

Click on the highlighted (blue) text to advance.

This is my first game, so I welcome feedback! And thank you for playing!
